page.title: 03SANDY FROM THE SANDHILLS
page.content: WHEN YOU STAND ON THE TOP OF THE SANDHILLS YOU CAN SEE LOTS OF INTERESTING PLACES.IN SANDY ITSELF YOU CAN SEE ST.SWITHUNS CHURCH AND THE FIRE STATION TOWER.ALL THE HOUSES LOOK SMALL.YOU CAN SEE 4 OF THE SCHOOLS IN SANDY BUT NOT LABURNHAM ROAD SCHOOL WHICH IS HIDDEN AMONGST THE HOUSES. ALONG THE HORIZON YOU CAN SEE GOLDINGTON POWER STATION IN BEDFORD,AND THE TREE PLANTATION IN MOGGERHANGER. AT THE BOTTOM OF THE SANDHILLS IS THE RAILWAY LINE WITH A ROAD BRIDGE ACROSS IT.THERE IS A FOOTBRIDGE JUST TO THE LEFT OF THE SANDHILLS LEADING TO THE TOWN. ACROSS TO THE RIGHT YOU CAN SEE PART OF THE BUSY A.1.TO THE LEFT ARE THE GROUNDS OF SANDY LODGE,THE HEADQUARTERS OF THE ROYAL SOCIETY FOR THE PROTECTION OF BIRDS.
